metadata.name: Alt Horsemen (War Update)
metadata.description:
This mod adds a completely new harbinger for the alternate path! Also comes with a unique (stronger) cube of meat variant.
Requires [b]Custom Stage API[/b] (for now) get it -> [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1348031964]here[/url]
-----------------------------------------
[h1]Harbinger Hitlist[/h1] [list] [*]Famine (Downpour/Dross) ✓
[*]Pestilence ✗ [*]War ✗ [*]Death ✗ [*]Conquest (?) [*]Headless Horseman (?) [/list]
When the horsemen get added into the alt path officially, this mod will cease to exist forever
-----------------------------------------
[h1]Credits[/h1] lambchop_is_ok - Sprites hippocrunchy - Design, Sprites, Implementation jubbalub - Tumor Item Concept NotYourSagittarius - Original Character Design
